title: Diabetes Prediction Using Voting Regressor
description: In this lab, we will use a Voting Regressor to predict the progression of diabetes in patients. We will use three different regressors to predict the data: Gradient Boosting Regressor, Random Forest Regressor, and Linear Regression. Then the above 3 regressors will be used for the Voting Regressor. Finally, we will plot the predictions made by all models for comparison.

meta.title: Diabetes Prediction with Voting Regressor | Machine Learning Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to use a Voting Regressor to predict the progression of diabetes in patients, including Gradient Boosting, Random Forest, and Linear Regression models.
meta.keywords: diabetes prediction, voting regressor, machine learning, gradient boosting, random forest, linear regression

i18n.title: 使用投票回归器进行糖尿病预测
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将使用投票回归器来预测患者糖尿病的进展情况。我们将使用三种不同的回归器来预测数据：梯度提升回归器、随机森林回归器和线性回归。然后将上述3个回归器用于投票回归器。最后，我们将绘制所有模型的预测结果进行比较。

meta.title: 使用投票回归器进行糖尿病预测 | 机器学习教程
meta.description: 学习如何使用投票回归器预测患者糖尿病的进展，包括梯度提升、随机森林和线性回归模型。
meta.keywords: 糖尿病预测, 投票回归器, 机器学习, 梯度提升, 随机森林, 线性回归
